data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Describe the last time you did something fun outdoors. What did you think of the experience? What are some benefits of spending time outside?
data.answer: The last time I did something fun outdoors was when I played tennis for 7 hours on a weekend day with my friends. It was three weeks ago when the weather finally turned sunny after a few weeks of rain. I think the experience was great as we were all fully rested and looked forward to it. There are a lot of benefits to spending time outside. Exposure to the sunshine and sweating is healthy. Spending time with friends is also important as it is essential for social life.
